```{r visualise-setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  message = FALSE,
  warning = TRUE,
  dev = "png",
  cache = TRUE,
  cache.path = ".cache/",
  fig.path = "imgs/",
  fig.width = 11,
  fig.height = 5
)
options(htmltools.dir.version = FALSE)
library(ggplot2)
library(gapminder)
library(sf)
```
